extension.description: Let Kodi control your Lifx lights. Either turns the lights into a room-sized ambilight, or automatically dims and un-dims them when playback starts.
extension.disclaimer: By using this, you take reponsibility for anything that happens.
extension.news: 0.1.0 (2016-08-26) - feature packed major release - feature - now it's possible to have ambilight on for a group and just dim another group of bulbs or all bulbs. - feature - same or different color for all lights - feature - override kelvin when dimmed (started/resumed) and undimmed(paused/stopped) - fix - better state checking, so restores lights state when video stops
